page.description: What preparations can you make before you make an appointment to come

story.p:

Please take the following steps to prepare for your massage.

ul.li: For hygienic reasons, you may want to take a shower before your appointment.
Make sure that you do not need to hurry to your appointment. To ensure that you are not rushed, you might consider a quick walk before your appointment.
Switch off your telephone before entering the massage practice. This will prevent any disruption during treatment.

story.p: After the treatment you will have the opportunity to regain yourself. You may want to have a glass of water as this will help to get rid of any toxins.

If you are unable to attend your appointment, please notify me as soon as possible. I require at least 24 hoursâ€™ notice. If you do not cancel your appointment at least 24 hours in advance, you will be charged a fee. Exceptional cases will be resolved in consultation between both parties.
Only cash payments are accepted. Please pay with the exact amount if possible. I do not have bank card or credit card facilities.
